name: Key

types.name: Key
types.comment: Keys that can be passed from an event.

values.name: onKey
values.comment:
Capture events for things like text fields or text areas.
It grabs the **key** value at `event.key`

values.name: onKeyWithOptions
values.comment:
Capture events for things like text fields or text areas.
It grabs the **key** value at `event.key`. Accepts options.
